actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To provide for the acquisition of certain lands formerly occupied by the Franklin D. Roosevelt family, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified lands and interests (including development rights and easements) in the properties located at Hyde Park, New York, that were owned by Franklin D. Roosevelt or his family at the time of death, to be added to and administered as part of the Franklin Delano Roosevelt National Historic Site or the Eleanor Roosevelt National Historic Site, as appropriate.

titles.title: To provide for the acquisition of certain lands formerly occupied by the Franklin D. Roosevelt family, and for other purposes.
